benediction.data.night.3.name: Arcane Domination

benediction.data.night.3.description.1: At the <style="value">Start</style> of each turn, you may activate this ability to <style="status">Re-Roll</style> up to <style="value">{0} Ambient Mana</style>. <style="value">Gold</style> will always be selected if present

benediction.data.night.3.activation_remi: You have not Activated your Benediction for this Turn. Do you want to continue with Exploration or check the Benediction first?
